Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.dmitriev.implementor

Class ImplFileAssistant

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.dmitriev.implementor.ImplFileAssistant
class ImplFileAssistant extends Object
This class provides an interface for working with files. This class allows BaseImplementor and Implementor to generate code.
Since:
21
Author:
Dmitriev Vladislav (bitree2004@yandex.ru)

    • exceptionMessageWithReason

      static String exceptionMessageWithReason(String text, String reason)
      Concatenate text and reason in special format "%s! Cause: %s." for using in exception.
      Parameters:
      text - String that will be in first part
      reason - String that will be in second part
      Returns:
      String text of exception.

    • getPath

      static Path getPath(Class<?> token, String extension)
      Returns the Path of Class by token and with extension.
      Parameters:
      token - Class that the full path will return
      extension - String extension of file
      Returns:
      Path full class path

    • getPath

      static Path getPath(Class<?> token, Path root)
      Found directory of full class path of token relative root.
      Parameters:
      token - Class that the full path will return
      root - Path relative to which the result will be found
      Returns:
      Path full class path

    • tryCreateDirectory

      static Path tryCreateDirectory(Path pathCode)
      Return parent path or if parent doesn't exist. If parent exist, then function tried to create parent. If it's impossible, warning will be written in STDERR.
      Parameters:
      pathCode - Path of file
      Returns:
      parent path

    • getCodePath

      static Path getCodePath(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      It's a function getPath(Class, Path). Wraps the exception InvalidPathException to exception ImplerException. After function will try to create directory by tryCreateDirectory(Path).
      Parameters:
      token - Class that the full path will return
      root - Path relative to which the result will be found
      Returns:
      Path full class path
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if getPath(Class, Path) threw InvalidPathException

    • getPath

      static Path getPath(String pathName) throws ImplerException
      It's a function Path.of(String, String...). Wraps the exception InvalidPathException in exception ImplerException.
      Parameters:
      pathName - the path string
      Returns:
      the path of pathName
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if Path.of(String, String...) threw InvalidPathException
      See Also:
      • Path.of(String, String...)

    • getClassPath

      static Path getClassPath(Class<?> token) throws ImplerException
      Returns class path of token.
      Parameters:
      token - Path
      Returns:
      path of token.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if it couldn't convert to URO

    • createTmpDirectory

      static Path createTmpDirectory(Path root) throws ImplerException
      Creates a temp directory with root and prefix "tmp_". Is a wrapper over a function Files.createTempDirectory(String, FileAttribute[]). Wraps the exception IOException to exception ImplerException.
      Parameters:
      root - Path of created directory without prefix.
      Returns:
      Path of temp directory that was created
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if Files.createTempDirectory(String, FileAttribute[]) threw exception.

    • toFormat

      static String toFormat(String s)
      Translate s to unicode format.
      Parameters:
      s - String for translate
      Returns:
      translated string
